title: 수동태 진행형
examples: The building is being constructed by a famous architect.
The issue was being discussed when I arrived.
New features are being added to the software regularly.

sentences.kr: 건물이 유명한 건축가에 의해 건설되고 있습니다.
sentences.en: The building is being constructed by a famous architect.

sentences.kr: 내가 도착했을 때 그 문제가 논의되고 있었습니다.
sentences.en: The issue was being discussed when I arrived.

sentences.kr: 소프트웨어에 새로운 기능들이 정기적으로 추가되고 있습니다.
sentences.en: New features are being added to the software regularly.
The report is being reviewed by multiple departments.
The new policy was being explained to employees.
The system is not being updated currently.

sentences.kr: 제품이 전 세계 시장에서 판매되고 있습니다.
sentences.en: The product is being sold in global markets.

sentences.kr: 새로운 직원들이 인사팀에 의해 교육받고 있었습니다.
sentences.en: New employees were being trained by the HR department.
